20101221070717.000|20101221070721.000|CC1|ART BANNING.

20101221070754.000|20101221070755.000|CC1|THERE RECOURSE TO

20101221070757.000|20101221070758.000|CC1|JUST A SENSELESSLY

20101221070759.000|20101221070802.000|CC1|ROUTINIZED TROPES.              
20101221070802.000|20101221070804.000|CC1|BUT CANTOR'S META-REIFICATION   
20101221070804.000|20101221070805.000|CC1|MIRRORS OUR OWN INCONTROVERTIBLE
20101221070805.000|20101221070808.000|CC1|PASSIVITY, WHICH IS THRUST BACK 
20101221070808.000|20101221070811.000|CC1|UPON US, REFRAMED, AND IN A

20101221070820.000|20101221070822.000|CC1|ART THAT ISN'T THERE, MAKING THE

20101221070857.000|20101221070859.000|CC1|NATIONAL MUSEUM OF AMERICAN

20101221070908.000|20101221070912.000|CC1|NOW FIRST, FIRST, I OFFERED THEM

20101221070914.000|20101221070915.000|CC1|DOESN'T HAVE ALL HIS SHOTS.

20101221070949.000|20101221070951.000|CC1|( LAUGHTER )
